title: Gateway Reconciliation report times out
description:
The base report at /civicrm/report/contribute/reconciliation is timing out.

We might be able to simply increase webserver timeouts.  We should also be able to create Pats a new report instance with more constrained criteria, which will hopefully run a bit faster.

Report criteria:
Whatever we have in the gateway recon is perfect.

I need to able to:
- choose dates, 
- see amount and 
- number of donations

And filter by:

country
method
gateway
currency
Credit (+) or Debit (-)

Steps to run the report sanely:
* Log into CiviCRM
* Visit https://civicrm.wikimedia.org/civicrm/report/instance/52?reset=1
* Edit the report criteria to do what u need.
* Change the report name and "Save As".
* Use the new report.
